DOC.brief_summary: MR Elastography new technique aim non-invasively measure stiffness tissue . It recently give interesting result assessment liver fibrosis . The objective current study : 1. develop image protocol MR Elastography kidneys ; 2 . To calculate stiffness normal kidney ; 3 . To evaluate variability measurement kidney stiffness repeat procedure twice volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Renal Magnetic Resonance ( MR ) Elastography Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Age 18 40 Signed inform consent form Insured French Social Security Pregnancy Personal familial history kidney disease Hypertension Diabetes Contraindication MRI
